trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"></xref> class encapsulates the transport security settings for queued transports.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
Message Queuing (MSMQ) can authenticate messages that are sent to message queues that require authentication, or messages can explicitly request authentication.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
Message Queuing (MSMQ) can encrypt messages on the wire when transferring messages between message queue managers.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
